item.title: Emmet and JSX
item.author: amancioandre@gmail.com (andré.amnc)
item.description: If you’ve ever written HTML tags in an JSX file, you would already have noticed that you lost that flavourish VSCode Emmet autocomplete. Sit back and relax, where there is a will there is a way. Photo by Ferhat Deniz Fors on Unsplash All you have to do is cmd+shift+p on your Mac, or ctrl+ship+p for Linux/Windows to open your Profile>Settings/Json and add the following lines:
